DOC.brief_summary: This prospective randomized control study compare efficacy cryolipolysis versus combination cryolipolysis surgical subcision treatment cellulite . The treatment sit outer thigh . One outer thigh randomize receive one treatment cryolipolysis , contralateral thigh assign receive combination cryolipolysis plus surgical subcision . A live rating blind dermatologist evaluate treatment control area use cellulite severity scale week 0 ( treatment ) 3-month follow visit .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy female subject 1865 year age least 5 CSS scale outer thigh . 2 . All subject must affect area show mattress phenomenon spontaneously stand lie standing ( Stage 2 3 NurnbergerMuller grade scale cellulite7 ) . 3 . Subjects willing ability understand provide inform consent participation study able communicate investigator . 1 . Subjects pregnant lactating . 2 . Subjects unable understand protocol give inform consent . 3 . Subjects currently treatment antiplatelet anticoagulant medical problem patient coagulation disorder . 4 . Subjects know history coldinduced disease cryoglobulinemia , paroxysmal cold hemoglobulinuria , cold urticaria . 5 . Subjects active skin disease skin infection treatment area . 6 . Subjects allergic lidocaine prilocaine . 7 . Subjects allergic cephalexin ( penicillin ) AND levofloxacin ( another quinolone antibiotic ) . 8 . Subjects history abnormal scarring .
